name: Patrick Valera
summary: I am a computer science student and a self-taught web developer. I aim to deepen my understanding of various technologies and build exceptional products.

projects.title: Candelebra
projects.description: A real-time mock stock trading platform/Visualizer. Updates to the stock prices happens in every few seconds.

projects.title: Groovemade
projects.description: A fullstack online E-commerce store, complete with user creation/management, order placement and admin control. Features a sleek and modern design.

projects.title: Artifox
projects.description: A Fullstack Online Store. Buile theartifox.com from scratch, styling done via SASS
